BURN_BLOCKED_ROLE().notice: Returns the role identifier for burning tokens from blocked accounts

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Returns the domain separator used for permit signatures

ISSUER_ROLE().notice: Returns the role identifier for issuing tokens

PAUSE_ROLE().notice: Returns the role identifier for pausing the contract

UNPAUSE_ROLE().notice: Returns the role identifier for unpausing the contract

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of tokens that spender is allowed to spend on behalf of owner

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves another address to spend tokens on behalf of the caller

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the token balance of a specific account

burn(uint256).notice: Burns tokens from the caller's balance

burnBlocked(address,uint256).notice: Burns tokens from a blocked account (admin function)

burnWithMemo(uint256,bytes32).notice: Burns tokens from the caller's balance with an attached memo

currency().notice: Returns the currency identifier of the token

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals used by the token

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new tokens to a specified address

mintWithMemo(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: Mints new tokens to a specified address with an attached memo

name().notice: Returns the name of the token

nonces(address).notice: Returns the current nonce for permit signatures for a given owner

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing transfers and other operations

paused().notice: Returns whether the contract is currently paused

salts(address,bytes4).notice: Returns whether a salt has been used for a specific account

setSupplyCap(uint256).notice: Sets a new supply cap for the token

supplyCap().notice: Returns the maximum supply cap for the token

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the token

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from caller to another address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from one address to another using allowance

transferFromWithMemo(address,address,uin.notice: Transfers tokens from one address to another with a memo using allowance

transferPolicyId().notice: Returns the current transfer policy identifier

transferWithMemo(address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Transfers tokens with an attached memo

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing transfers and other operations to resume
